content: knitted jumper with raglan and lace pattern worked top down in drops merino extra fine sizes s - xxxl drops design pattern no me-104 yarn group b ----------------------------------------------------------- sizes s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl materials drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 400-450-500-500-550-650 g color 15 light grayish green drops double pointed needles and circular needles 40 + 60 or 80 cm / 16 + 24 or 32 size 4 mm/us 6 or the needles needed to get 21 stitches and 28 row stockinette stitch on 10 cm / 4 in width and 10 cm / 4 in height
